title: rAma kathA sAgara
sahitya:
rAma kathA sAgara mIdE vArevarayyA rAjyamulO O janulAra


anupallavi

  kAmakOTi sundaruni caritamulu ghanamuga pogaDi
alasiri vidhi shOSAgjnanEyAdulu teliyaka


caraNam    umAdEviki delusunA shrI ramAdEvikinaina delusunA 
vimAma carulaina surulaku delusunA
kumAra janakuDaina sadAshivuniki delusugAni vAnitappa
